name: Project 4JD UI Configuration File
summary: Learn about .UI4JD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Minecraft Bedrock Edition add-ons (.MCPACK files) allow players to alter the game's gameplay or UI. Project 4JD UI is an add-on that allows players to revert the game's current UI to a previous version, referred to as the 4JD Legacy Console UI.

Project 4JD UI is distributed as a .ZIP file, which players must rename to use the .mcpack extension before they can install it. This ZIP file contains all the add-on's constituent files, including resources and configuration files. Many of these configuration files are saved with the .ui4jd extension.

instructions: You can open a UI4JD file and view the data it contains with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multipaltform) or any other text editor.
To install the Project 4JD UI add-on, refer to the instructions on the add-on's GitHub page.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
